DOC.detailed_description: The study consist two phase . The first phase cross-sectional , case-control study measure sensitivity specificity methacholine challenge test differentiate asthmatic participant non-asthmatic control . The second phase cross-over , randomize , double-masked trial design evaluate impact high dose versus low dose inhale corticosteroid ( ICS ) bronchial hyperreactivity ( BHR ) asthmatic .
